website_summaries.verdict: Cool fabric enables pets to feel refreshed as soon as their bodies make contact with it.
pros: Made of breathable mesh and self- cooling fabric
Require no batteries, refrigeration, or electricity to keep cool
Fabric doesn't collect hair and fur like other fabrics
Good for puppies, kittens, and cats, too
cons: Cooling material is only on one side of mat

customer_reviews.title: It's cooler than a regular blanket
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not sure I would call this a cooling blanket in the traditional sense. It does not warm up like a normal blanket, so I think it is worth it if you are looking for some cushioning that won't increase body temperature much. I've used it in my dog's stroller for a little cushion while trying to keep him cool. It's soft and he has no issues with lying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves This Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket to replace the one my cat uses in the cold weather. Once the warm weather began, she stopped using her winter blanket. I looked on Amazon for a replacement and found the PAWZ self cooling blanket. I decided to purchase it based on the good reviews and the fact that it is washable. My cat and I have not been disappointed! Since the hot summer days have arrived, my cat spends most of her resting time curled up on this cute little blanket. Nice quality item, easy to clean. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Blu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as a "cooling" mat
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing "cooling" about this blanket. I was hoping this blanket would help my Golden Retriever to stay cooler when sleeping at night, but within 5 minutes of laying down on this blanket (which is only 2 types of material sewn together), she started panting. Within another minute, she got up and went to sleep on the wood floor. There is no "cooling gel" type of material in this blanket. Appears to be made of a polyester or rayon type of material on one side and a mesh material on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My 90 lb. lab likes it! It’s on top of her soft dog bed and seems to make her cool and happy because she normally avoids the bed when it’s a warm day. It’s also definitely large enough for a big dog. It’s blue with white polka dogs and as cute as that is, it might be nice if it also came in more neutral colors.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool
customer_reviews.text: Our doggy loves the mat, before and after me trying to figure out which side is the cool side to sleep on (the light blue side, follow the tag). I like that it's large and can be folded (to fit in crate for example). I plan on getting another mat for use upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ishmoney

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: My Boxer is always hot when the temperature hits 70 or above, so she has a cooling bed that's great and I bought this blanket to put on my bed. She lays right on it and chills all night.
customer_reviews.author: GET

customer_reviews.title: My westie loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: Our westie was trained to use this as her "go to place" command. But it took little effort because she loves the checked side on our hot Texas days. We take it with us when we travel and she will easily go to it when told to go to place. Eager to see if she likes the other side as much when it gets cooler this winter. Launders in washer well and I let it air dry. She's a chewer but has made no attempt to chew this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cool to make them purrs
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats loves this and it is perfect for this hot weather to help them stay cool. I had ordered another one in blue so both of the cats won't be fighting over it for the rest of the summer. It is cool too when I touch it blanket so I know the cats do really enjoy sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: JoKitten

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited for this product after I saw so many ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited for this product after I saw so many raving reviews. It didn't work. It didn't come with any instructions and I was under the impression that pressure from your pet would result in cooling. My cat didn't lay on it. I tried the mat and it didn't cool me whatsoever. Very disappointed and can't figure out where I went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this cooling blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I got this blanket for my dog who always wants to lay on the cold floor than on top of blankets. I put this in front of her and she has not moved for hours. She LOVES this blanket! It is cool to the touch and lightweight. I am super pleased with the purchase and I think it’s safe to say my dog is too!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It appears to stay cool and is very easy to clean I only gave 4 stars as it isn't as soft as I had hoped for the dogs. However that being said the dogs LOVE it and use it every night to sleep on in the bed. Our two grown heelers and husky pup love sleeping on it
customer_reviews.author: Ian White

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Cooling Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight cooling blanket for dogs, the more intensive cooling blankets like Arf have a different texture and weigh up to 6 lbs some dogs don't like. However, I use both and it keeps her nice, cool and calm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat says: "Meh".
customer_reviews.text: I think it feels kinda cool.. even tho it is the opposite side (not the polka dotted side). My cats think it's "meh", they prefer to lay next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fine.
customer_reviews.text: It is just a tiny blanket/pad made with cool material on one side, not so much a cooling pad. Its alright. But I will be looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Ms_CeeJay

customer_reviews.title: My feral cat loves it during the heat of summer!
customer_reviews.text: He is in his outdoor house right now with the cooling blanket under him.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my Pup cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blanket , it feels almost like a sleeping bag material but mesh if that makes sense. Either way it is cool to the touch and my fluffy yorkie , pom loves it. Great price !
customer_reviews.author: Shanice Powell

customer_reviews.title: My cat seems to love it😀
customer_reviews.text: Blanket breathes very well. Price is reasonable and attractive polka dot print!
customer_reviews.author: jmj

customer_reviews.title: My pug and lab love this dog blanket
customer_reviews.text: My pug and lab love this dog blanket! In Florida, it is HOT! They go right to it after being outside. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Janene Redfield

customer_reviews.title: For a tiny dog only
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap, so not worried. It just doesn't stay down. Dogs nails get caught on fabric and it rolls up under her. Must fix it after each nap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Breathble side & cool in touch side Light weight good for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: MiO

customer_reviews.title: Does work
customer_reviews.text: It does keep your pet cool because the blanket is able to breathe with airflow. My pug loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaycbax

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: Not really certain that it works all that well. Dog doesn't seem to want to lay on it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Bough this to replace since that padding was a sheep like material that made him hot
customer_reviews.text: My puppy tends to get hot and he ripped though the padding on his pet carrier. Bough this to replace since that padding was a sheep like material that made him hot. We use the blanket now for everyday stuff and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Monterrey

customer_reviews.title: It stays cool to the touch no matter what the temperature
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this blanket. It stays cool to the touch no matter what the temperature. It would be good on those hot nights on a pillow for humans.
customer_reviews.author: scooter

customer_reviews.title: Purrr-fect for our kitty!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for travel for our move to keep our cat cool, she loved it and it was a very comfortable car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Truenorthfitness

customer_reviews.title: Quickly approved
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mat and I cant believe how much my pups like it already. My Bella has been laying on the tile to keep cool but as soon as I laid this down she was quick to own it :)
customer_reviews.author: jlali

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as I was hoping. Dogs didn't like it. Had an odd smell.
customer_reviews.author: Christina McClure

customer_reviews.title: She loves it so much and it definitely keeps her cool on these hot summer days
customer_reviews.text: I see my cat laying on this every day. She loves it so much and it definitely keeps her cool on these hot summer days.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy lays on her blankets during the night and plays with her toys on it too. Got a large blanket for when she becomes full grown and allows for play room and a small one for her kennel. Cool to the touch and perfect for these hot summer times.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia d.

customer_reviews.title: Cool on one side
customer_reviews.text: Cool is only on the underside....the side that is not poke-a-dot.
customer_reviews.author: Link37

customer_reviews.title: Cooling Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Use it for a cooling blanket for my puppy’s bed. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I works. Fits perfectly in their bed. Not sure I would buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: florence

customer_reviews.title: Cat in Vegas keeping cool.
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves it and keeps her cooler during the Vegas summer.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: great idea
customer_reviews.text: My kitties would not touch it & they usually lay on everything :'(
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Wiegele

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket for the summer
customer_reviews.text: My pug loves it. It kept him cool at nights in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It actually is cooling and my dogs love it! Worth every cent
customer_reviews.author: Leah

product_meta.title: PAWZ Road Pet Dog Blanket Self-Cooling and Breathable Material Snuggly Mat
product_meta.description:
PAWZ Road pet Self-cooling blanket is designed for furry friends to provide a 
Cooling spot during the hot summer. 

Our Advantages: 
1.Breathable Mesh allows for more fresh air to help cool down the temperature so that the blanket wont warm up. 
2.Ice Silk Material quite soft and smooth, 3 degrees than regular material that is cooling to touch 
3.Blue/Pink with white dot design looks fresh during the summer. 
4.Light weight and foldable easy to carry that allows pet to enjoy its cooling spot any where. 
5. Availlable in 3 sizes satisfy different breeds of dogs. 

Specification 

S 20"*30"/51*76cm 
M:30"*40"/76*102cm 
L:40"*55"/102*140cm
feature_bullets: BLANKET DIMENSION: Measuring in 20"x30" features with Blue color and white dots design creating a sense of cooling during the hot summer, the blanket is perfect for cats and small dogs.

BREATHABLE AND SELF COOLING MATERIAL: The surface is applied with ice silk which feels smooth and cooling to touch. While the bottom is made of air mesh which is open to breath that allows for more fresh air and keep it from warming up.
NO ELECTRICITY REQUIRED: The self cooling blanket requires no electricity to maintain cool. With its unique material technique, it is usually 3 degrees lower than regular blanket fabric.

BEST GIFT IN SUMMER: Keeping it around the house, car, and other areas where they can just lay down and enjoy the cooling surface and stop pacing and sweating.so don’t forget to take it to provide a cooling spot for your dog even you are travelling.

EASY TO CARE: It’s machine washable and dry super easy to care. And pls kindly be noted that it is different from the cold (Icy) mat. It is 3 degrees lower than regular blanket. We’d like to suggest you to place it in air conditional for better cooling function
